# Since AI

> Since AI is Europe's only full-lifecycle AI innovation ecosystem with 500+ members, based in Turku, Finland. We support AI projects from challenge ideation through hackathon building to production deployment and commercialization.

## About

Since AI (Since AI ry, business ID 3593920-2) is a registered non-profit organization founded in 2025. Unlike traditional hackathon organizers, we provide end-to-end support: co-creating challenges with companies, running intensive 72-hour hackathons, providing 8+ weeks of post-event production deployment support, and facilitating commercialization through our Antler partnership.

- Website: https://sinceai.fi
- Type: Full-lifecycle AI innovation ecosystem
- Location: Turku, Finland
- Members: 500+
- Hackathon Participants: 260+
- Projects Shipped: 30+
- Partners: 15+

## Key Differentiators

1. **Full Innovation Lifecycle**: Only community supporting ideation → hackathon → production → commercialization
2. **Production Support**: 8+ weeks of post-hackathon deployment assistance
3. **European AI Sovereignty**: Open-source initiatives for European AI independence
4. **Research-Market Bridge**: Helping academics commercialize AI research
5. **Entrepreneurship Support**: Startup formation through Antler partnership

## Key Events

- **Since AI Hackathon 2025**: Nov 21–23, 2025 at EduCity, Turku. 260 builders, 30+ projects.
- **Since AI Hackathon 2026**: Planned for November 2026 in Turku. Dates TBA.

## Blog & Guides

- [AI Hackathon Project Ideas](https://sinceai.fi/blog/ai-hackathon-project-ideas): 30 buildable AI project concepts.
- [Best AI Hackathons in Europe](https://sinceai.fi/blog/best-ai-hackathons-in-europe): Curated guide to top European AI hackathons.
- [Hackathon Tech Stack Guide](https://sinceai.fi/blog/hackathon-tech-stack-guide): Battle-tested stack recommendations.
- [How to Build a Demo in 72 Hours](https://sinceai.fi/blog/how-to-build-a-demo-in-72-hours): Demo-first approach to hackathon success.
- [How to Win an AI Hackathon](https://sinceai.fi/blog/how-to-win-an-ai-hackathon): Demo-first playbook for winning.
- [How to Form a Hackathon Team](https://sinceai.fi/blog/how-to-form-a-hackathon-team): Team building like a startup.
